reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson's lectures are engaging and well-structured. She's always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor! Prof. Chen's passion for coding is contagious. His projects are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez knows her stuff, but her exams can be overly difficult. More practice questions would be helpful.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Anderson brings history to life with his storytelling. Sometimes goes off-topic, but always interesting.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Patel is an amazing teacher. Her lab demonstrations are top-notch and she explains complex concepts clearly.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Johnson's lectures are dry and hard to follow. The textbook is more helpful than his classes.

reviews.subject: Spanish
reviews.review: Â¡Excelente! Dr. Gonzalez creates a immersive language environment. Her classes are fun and effective.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson's enthusiasm for physics is evident. His problem-solving sessions are particularly helpful.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Lee assigns interesting readings, but her lectures can be a bit disorganized. Grading is fair though.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Mind-blowing discussions in every class! Prof. Brown challenges you to think critically about everything.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's field trips make learning come alive. She's very knowledgeable about current environmental issues.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Ivanov is brilliant, but struggles to explain concepts at an undergraduate level. Office hours are helpful though.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Greene's passion for art is infectious. Her virtual museum tours are a highlight of the course.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Chang's real-world examples make complex theories understandable. His projects are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez encourages good debates, but sometimes lets discussions get off track. Interesting course overall.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Prof. Kim's industry experience adds tremendous value to the class. Great at connecting theory to practice.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Wright's analysis of texts is insightful. Her essay feedback is detailed and helpful for improvement.

reviews.subject: Astronomy
reviews.review: Prof. Davis makes the cosmos accessible. The night sky observation sessions are unforgettable!

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Nelson's research is cutting-edge, but her lectures can be hard to follow. Study groups are essential.

reviews.subject: International Relations
reviews.review: Prof. Hassan brings a global perspective to every discussion. His simulation exercises are particularly enlightening.
